name: Python Jupyter Development
postCreateCommand: mkdir -p ~/opt && pip install --user ipykernel jupyter jupyterlab requests requests-cache pandas numpy matplotlib seaborn scikit-learn plotnine folium jupyterlite-simple-cors-proxy montydb sqlite-utils shinylive && ARCH=$(uname -m) && if [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ] || [ "$ARCH" = "arm64" ]; then QUARTO_ARCH="arm64"; else QUARTO_ARCH="amd64"; fi && wget "https://github.com/quarto-dev/quarto-cli/releases/download/v1.6.40/quarto-1.6.40-linux-${QUARTO_ARCH}.tar.gz" && tar -C ~/opt -xvzf "quarto-1.6.40-linux-${QUARTO_ARCH}.tar.gz" && quarto add r-wasm/quarto-live
